title: Should I buy an iPhone 6S 64GB or 6s Plus 16GB? - Quora

response.answer_text: 16gb is probably too small. Add a few podcasts, shoot some videos, and have a normal amount of text messages and you’ll be running out of space pretty fast. And don’t even get me started on apps like WhatsApp. Those can be huge if they save all your old conversations. But the plus model is a big phone. It’s hard to use with one hand, and easier to drop. That’s the model I use most of the time, but I know how I use my phone, and in it’s near 3 years of use it’s been dropped maybe twice. Your mileage may vary. All in all, I would recommend the 64gb plus. It’s easier to drop, but the space on the smaller screen is too little to be very useful.

Don’t buy an iPhone, I got my iPhone 6s 64GB for 2 years and now it’s rubbish after the release of iOs 11. Freezes a lot, crashes apps, random glitches.. I have replaced the battery 2 weeks ago, still same thing… All the parts replacements were done in Apple store. I don’t know about the ones you buy brand new from the shops these days, but trust me when I say it’s almost impossible to use it now when It’s poorly functioning.
